title: Home
content:
Hello! You’ve stumbled across my site for hosting uni stuff.
There’s not much here at the moment, so here’s a picture of a poorly-drawn cookie:

title: Phaser Example
content: Phaser SHMUP Example         Controls     Arrow keys to move Space to shoot (you can shoot the asteroids falling down) Z key to change weapon type (there are 3 types - single, double spread, ripple scaling)  The spaceship can collide and push around the asteroid sprites - damage doesn’t exist yet.

title: Unity Example
content: Unity Game   Oops - looks like your browser's not compatible.    Controls     Arrow keys to move Space to shoot Z key to change weapon type (there are 4 types - the last one’s more of a cheat thing) Number keys to spawn more enemies (this is a debug thing and may not work properly with everything else)
